item.title: Need help really easy proboly!
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

[quote=“humza-ali, post:1, topic:259822”]hi my command noclip only i can do it and i want only me n my friend to do it this is the code i tryed making it playerrights 3 but it didint work

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("humza")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been kicked!"); disconnected = true;
thanks :)[/quote]

have it to look like this
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been kicked!");
disconnected = true;
because 3=owner, mostly 2=admin but if that doesn’t work than its 1=admin, 0=mod
